And now, I would like to announce a new project.
Ebichu Nanyanen will be collaborating with Kuji Live, a media specialized in online lottery.
Kuji-live is a media where you can enjoy raffle draws for limited-edition goods without any losers.
This time, as a special project of EBICHU Nanyanen linked Kuji Live, we will deliver limited contents such as videos and voices that can be obtained only at Kuji Live.
Now, let us announce the contents to be won in the lottery live.

The event will run from June 15 to 30, 2012 and will cost 330 yen a piece.
